assertionResults.title: should return PRO plan limits

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits getLimitsForPlan should return TEAMS plan limits
assertionResults.title: should return TEAMS plan limits

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits hasReachedLimit should return false for unlimited limits
assertionResults.title: should return false for unlimited limits

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits hasReachedLimit should return true when limit is reached
assertionResults.title: should return true when limit is reached

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits hasReachedLimit should return true when limit is exceeded
assertionResults.title: should return true when limit is exceeded

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits hasReachedLimit should return false when under limit
assertionResults.title: should return false when under limit

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits getFeatureAccess should allow FREE users basic features
assertionResults.title: should allow FREE users basic features

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits getFeatureAccess should block FREE users at event limit
assertionResults.title: should block FREE users at event limit

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits getFeatureAccess should allow PRO users unlimited events
assertionResults.title: should allow PRO users unlimited events

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits getFeatureAccess should allow inactive PRO subscriptions until period ends
assertionResults.title: should allow inactive PRO subscriptions until period ends

assertionResults.fullName: Subscription Limits getFeatureAccess should default to FREE for null subscription
assertionResults.title: should default to FREE for null subscription
